title: Just when I thought pokemon design couldn't get any worse
body:
[We get a pokemon that is a box.](http://serebii.net/news/2016/30-June-2016.shtml)

I think this series really needs some new creative direction at this point.  I mean when a new pokemon makes the ice cream pokemon or the key pokemon look like an interesting design, you've got a problem.  At this point I wonder if gamefreak is stealing discarded drawings from 6 year olds.

But on the upside, there's a worse pokemon than the new blue starter.
